alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 13 at 3:59PM EDT until March 15 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Tyrrell, Mainland Dare, Mainland Hyde, West Carteret, East Carteret and Coastal Onslow Counties. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; West Carteret
